descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Emma - Follower[/size][/center]
[size=4]1. INFORMATION[/size]

Hi there, I made a follower. Her name is Emma and her race is Breton, uses the vanilla voiceset FemaleYoungEager, since I thought it fit her.

She has no level cap, so, keep playing and she will get good as well.

She also heals you or any followers you have when you take too much damage.

I also created a small script that makes her receive perks to stay strong with you. She's will also learn Fire spells as you level up.

Available in UNP and CBBE versions. As default clothing, she uses the Miner Clothes, variation 02.

Wanna play as her? Check my sister mod, 'Racemenu Presets' here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62132]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62132[/url]

[url=http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/kompanony/emma_follower/251-1-0-19686]Available in Russian here.[/url]

[size=4]2. LOCATION[/size]

She can be found on Sleeping Giant Inn, in Riverwood. Probably the most used place ever. :p

[size=4]3. INSTALLATION[/size]

I believe that you can use NMM to install the mod, but you are doing a Manual Installation, then just extract the files to the \Skyrim\Data folder and activate on your mod manager.

[size=4]4. CREDITS[/size]

[quote]Expired for RaceMenu.
hellosanta for 'SG Female Textures Renewal';
Hvergelmir for 'Brows';
nevenbridge for 'Natural Eyes';
The authors of 'KS Hairdo';
dimon99 for UNP body mesh.
Caliente for CBBE body mesh.
UNI00SL for the mod Vanilla Follower AI, which the Healer AI is based on.[/quote]

[size=4]5. PERMISSION[/size]

I would kindly ask you to not reupload the files without asking me first. Otherwise, use as you see fit.

I forgot to mention, Patricia is my current character, I was doing a comparison between her and Emma.

[size=4]6. CHANGELOG[/size]

Version 1.1:

Magic no longer overwrites weapons use, aka she won't use more fire spells if you have given her a one-handed sword or a bow, only she doesn't have ANY weapons.
Totally optional update, actually.
author: guicool

files.name: Update 1.1 - Optional
files.changelogHtml: Magic no longer overwrites weapons use, completely optional.
